channel.title: Game leave notifications used for meta gaming
channel.description: So a poss jumped into the last member of the Unseen, when he was put on trial all the dead unseen left the game lol. We were probably going to execute the guy anyway but if we hadn't been sure, we would have been 100% certain seeing that all the Unseen left the game. So maybe something should be done about this ...

item.title: Game leave notifications used for meta gaming
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
So a poss jumped into the last member of the Unseen, when he was put on trial all the dead unseen left the game lol. We were probably going to execute the guy anyway but if we hadn’t been sure, we would have been 100% certain seeing that all the Unseen left the game. So maybe something should be done about this …
